    • Uses of GeoLocation in kimononet.geo

      Methods in kimononet.geo that return GeoLocation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      static GeoLocation GeoLocation.generateRandomGeoLocation(GeoLocation upperLeftLocation, GeoLocation lowerRightLocation)
      Generates a random location bounded by the upper left corner and the bottom right corner.
      static GeoLocation GeoLocation.generateRandomGeoLocation(GeoMap map)
      Returns a random location bounded by the provided map.
      GeoLocation RandomWaypointGeoDevice.getLocation()
      Retrieves the current velocity using the method RandomWaypointGeoDevice.getVelocity() and updates the current location according to elapsed time.
      GeoLocation GeoDevice.getLocation()
      Returns current GPS location.
      GeoLocation DefaultGeoDevice.getLocation()
      Returns the current location.
      GeoLocation GeoMap.getLowerRight() 
      GeoLocation GeoMap.getUpperLeft() 
      Methods in kimononet.geo with parameters of type GeoLocation 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      float GeoLocation.bearingTo(GeoLocation loc2)
      Calculates the bearing from one GeoLocation to another.
      double GeoLocation.distanceTo(GeoLocation loc2)
      Uses Haversine formula to accurately calculate the distance to another GeoLocation.
      static GeoLocation GeoLocation.generateRandomGeoLocation(GeoLocation upperLeftLocation, GeoLocation lowerRightLocation)
      Generates a random location bounded by the upper left corner and the bottom right corner.
      void GeoMap.setDimensions(GeoLocation ul, GeoLocation lr) 
      Constructors in kimononet.geo with parameters of type GeoLocation 
      Constructor and Description
      DefaultGeoDevice(GeoLocation location, GeoVelocity velocity)
      Creates a new device that will fetch the System's time instead of utilizing a time provider.
      GeoMap(GeoLocation upperLeft, GeoLocation lowerRight) 
      RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation, GeoVelocity velocity)
      Creates a new random waypoint model using RandomWaypointGeoDevice.DEFAULT_MAX_TURN and RandomWaypointGeoDevice.DEFAULT_TURN_INTERVAL.
      RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation, GeoVelocity velocity, GeoMap map)
      Creates a new random waypoint model using RandomWaypointGeoDevice.DEFAULT_MAX_TURN and RandomWaypointGeoDevice.DEFAULT_TURN_INTERVAL.
      RandomWaypointGeoDevice(GeoLocation currentLocation, GeoVelocity velocity, TimeProvider timeProvider, double maxTurn, double turnInterval)
      Creates a new GPS enabled device emulator based on the Random Waypoint Model .
